statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerSegmentation;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerSegmentation;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE customer_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE customer_id = 5 AND first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE first_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 10;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 100;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;

SELECT customers.name, purchase_history.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_history.purchase_date = '2022-05-20';
SELECT name, email, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 3 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, target_customer_segment FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_amount > 500;

SELECT customers.name, transactions.amount, marketing_campaigns.campaign_name FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns ON transactions.amount > 5000 AND marketing_campaigns.campaign_type = 'Discount';

SELECT customers.name, COUNT(transactions.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_customers FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_amount, customer_id FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_customers FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, phone_number, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id JOIN products ON purchase_history.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
